p: GD Province was selected as the study area because it was the most seriously affected region by dengue in China. This province is situated in the southern China, which is an economic, finance, industry and transport center in China. It has an area of 179,800 km 2 and about 100.7 million inhabitants. GD is administratively divided into 21 prefecture-level cities (see Fig. 5), including 128 counties/districts (see Fig. 1). The climate is subtropical humid, with short, mild, dry winters and long, hot, wet summers. The annual mean temperature is 21.8 ∘C and the annual accumulate precipitation is 1789 mm.
